CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...3-4. The massive Dodge Motors sign extended the length of the entrance of the auditorium where the beautiful 1955 Dodge Royal Lancers, set up by Mr. Sanford, Mr. Snyder and Mr. Bernard of Sanford Motors, were on display. Mrs .Esther Austin added more beauty to the Dodge line...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Banner inscribed "For the best deal...see Sanford Motors, 4709 Baum Blvd. Penna's largest Dodge Plymouth dealer," at 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Banners--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
